forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.shortForecast: Slight Chance Rain Showers then Mostly Cloudy
forecast.detailedForecast: A slight chance of rain showers before 8pm. Mostly cloudy. Low around 64, with temperatures rising to around 67 overnight. West wind 3 to 7 mph. Chance of precipitation is 20%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

forecast.name: Monday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 88, with temperatures falling to around 86 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 6 mph.

forecast.name: Monday Night
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 67. West wind 1 to 6 mph.

forecast.name: Tuesday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 90. South southeast wind 1 to 6 mph.
